ygData.subject: E'ci Guild Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Things are looking good for our guild on E ci. I just received the ... I told her that our people on E ci would help look for him and petition if we see him.
ygData.messageBody:
Things are looking good for our guild on E'ci. I just received the
following from the GM, Kyala:

>I am trying to track down the person with your guild name in game so I
>can delete it, and make you the guild leader. Doing my best, this is one
>of those patient battles.

I told her that our people on E'ci would help look for him and petition
if we see him. His name is Tarismo. Hopefully it will be soon. Thanks go
to Sandy for spotting this in the first place and working hard to help
resolve it.
